column2: shape <- ggplot(data = LRRK2, aes(x = Position, y = Shape)) + geom_step(size = 0.25) + scale_x_continuous(name = "Amino Acid Number", limits = c(0, 2527), breaks = seq(0, 2527, by = 30)) + theme(aspect.ratio = 0.1) + geom_vline(xintercept = vars$`AA Num`, linetype = "dotted", color = 'red') +  geom_point(data = vars, x = vars$`AA Num`, y = vars$Shape, col = "red" ) + geom_text(data = vars, aes(x = vars$`AA Num`, y = vars$Shape, label = vars$Variant), nudge_y = -0.03, nudge_x = 6, cex = 2.5, angle = -30, font = 2) +
